mapper.sql: LD_AREA_CD, EFFC_TM, EXT_FLAG, PROV_CD, LD_AREA_NM, EXPIRED_TM, ACCORDING_FILE_NM, reserved1, reserved2, reserved3
mapper.insert: insert into UPAY_CSYS_LD_AREA_CD_PROV_EXT (LD_AREA_CD, EFFC_TM, EXT_FLAG, PROV_CD, LD_AREA_NM, EXPIRED_TM, ACCORDING_FILE_NM, reserved1, reserved2, reserved3) values (#{ldAreaCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{effcTm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{extFlag,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{provCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ldAreaNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{expiredTm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{accordingFileNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserved1,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserved2,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{reserved3,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

mapper.update:
update UPAY_CSYS_LD_AREA_CD_PROV_EXT
PROV_CD = #{provCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
LD_AREA_NM = #{ldAreaNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
EXPIRED_TM = #{expiredTm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACCORDING_FILE_NM = #{accordingFileNm,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
reserved1 = #{reserved1,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
reserved2 = #{reserved2,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
reserved3 = #{reserved3,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where LD_AREA_CD = #{ldAreaCd,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and EFFC_TM = #{effcTm,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and EXT_FLAG = #{extFlag,jdbcType=NUMERIC}
mapper.select:
select
from UPAY_CSYS_LD_AREA_CD_PROV_EXT where sysdate() >= parsedatetime(effc_tm, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH:MM:SS', 'cn') and sysdate() <= parsedatetime(expired_tm, 'yyyy-mm-dd HH:MM:SS', 'cn')
